page.title: 11Shopping around Ruan Minor
page.content: Out of all the people in the class most of them do some shopping in this area and most of them also do some shopping away.There are three shops here.One shop is the greengrocer's which sells fruit, vegetables and flowers.The other two shops are called A.P.T. and Spar.They both sell food,sweets,cards and things you need in the house like soap.People have to shop away to get things like furniture and clothes.Some of the places people go to are Helston,Falmouth,Truro and Penzance.It is difficult unless you have a car because there is only one bus a week. I used to live in Penzance but now I live in Kuggar.The main difference between Penzance and here is the number of shops. Penzance has a lot more people.
